amendment.description: Amendment expands the requirements of initial regulatory flexibility analyses to include an analysis of any impairment of the ability of small entities to have access to credit.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 113-361 to expand the requirements of initial regulatory flexibility analyses to include an analysis of any impairment of the ability of small entities to have access to credit.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rigell amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Rigell.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rigell amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
